column1: PT sentence: O preço é alto.
EN sentence: The price is high.
PT sentence: Não tenho dinheiro comigo.
RU sentence: У меня нет с собой наличных.
EN sentence: I don't have cash with me.
EN sentence: I pay by card.
EN sentence: I need the receipt.
EN sentence: The delivery was delayed.
PT sentence: Quero fazer uma troca.
RU sentence: Я хочу сделать обмен.
EN sentence: I want to make an exchange.
PT sentence: Preciso de uma devolução.
EN sentence: I need a return.
EN sentence: There is a discount today.
PT sentence: Isto está em promoção.
EN sentence: This is on sale.
PT sentence: O custo é elevado.
EN sentence: The cost is high.
PT sentence: O valor está correto.
EN sentence: The amount is correct.
PT sentence: O pagamento é imediato.
PT sentence: A caixa está ali.
EN sentence: The checkout is there.
EN sentence: The customer is waiting.
PT sentence: O atendimento foi bom.
EN sentence: The service was good.
PT sentence: Fale com a caixa.
EN sentence: Talk to the cashier.
EN sentence: There is a problem.
PT sentence: Quero fazer uma reclamação.
RU sentence: Я хочу подать жалобу.
EN sentence: I want to make a complaint.
EN sentence: I request a cancellation.
PT sentence: O prazo termina hoje.
EN sentence: The deadline is today.
PT sentence: Os produtos estão aqui.
EN sentence: The products are here.
RU sentence: Я пойду за покупками.
PT sentence: Compro pão todos os dias.
RU sentence: Я покупаю хлеб каждый день.
EN sentence: I buy bread every day.
PT sentence: Falta leite em casa.
RU sentence: Дома не хватает молока.
EN sentence: We are out of milk at home.
PT sentence: Este queijo é bom.
EN sentence: This cheese is good.
RU sentence: Я покупаю натуральный йогурт.
EN sentence: I buy natural yogurt.
PT sentence: Uso manteiga no pão.
RU sentence: Я использую сливочное масло на хлеб.
EN sentence: I use butter on bread.
PT sentence: Prefiro manteiga sem sal.
RU sentence: Я предпочитаю сливочное масло без соли.
EN sentence: I prefer unsalted butter.
PT sentence: Cozinho com óleo vegetal.
RU sentence: Я готовлю на растительном масле.
EN sentence: I cook with vegetable oil.
PT sentence: Não como muita carne.
RU sentence: Я не ем много мяса.
EN sentence: I don't eat much meat.
PT sentence: O frango está no forno.
EN sentence: The chicken is in the oven.
PT sentence: Compro carne de vaca fresca.
RU sentence: Я покупаю свежую говядину.
EN sentence: I buy fresh beef.
PT sentence: O peixe é fresco hoje.
EN sentence: The fish is fresh today.
PT sentence: Vou fazer salmão no forno.
RU sentence: Я приготовлю лосось в духовке.
EN sentence: I will make salmon in the oven.
RU sentence: Я стараюсь не есть колбасу.
EN sentence: I try to avoid sausages.
PT sentence: Compro fiambre para sandes.
RU sentence: Я покупаю ветчину для бутербродов.
EN sentence: I buy ham for sandwiches.
PT sentence: O arroz está pronto.
EN sentence: The rice is ready.
PT sentence: A massa está a cozer.
EN sentence: The pasta is cooking.
PT sentence: Gosto de massa italiana.
EN sentence: We are out of potatoes.

PT sentence: Uso alho para cozinhar.
RU sentence: Я использую чеснок для готовки.
EN sentence: I use garlic for cooking.
PT sentence: O tomate está maduro.
EN sentence: The tomato is ripe.
PT sentence: O pepino está fresco.
EN sentence: The cucumber is fresh.

EN sentence: I will make a salad.

EN sentence: The strawberries are sweet.

EN sentence: The grapes are fresh.

EN sentence: I buy baked goods at the bakery.
